Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Steam Economy
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.formula: \text{Steam Economy} = \frac{\text{kg of vapor produced}}{\text{kg of steam used}}

variables.kg of vapor produced: Mass of vapor generated in the evaporator
variables.kg of steam used: Mass of steam supplied to the evaporator

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Ratio of the mass of vapor produced to the mass of steam used, indicating evaporator efficiency.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Energy Balance in Evaporation
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.formula: V H_s + W C_{p w} T_1 = W C_{p w} T_2 + V H_s

variables.H_s: Enthalpy of vapor at saturation temperature

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Simplified energy balance for the evaporation process, assuming reference temperature 0°C and no heat losses.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Boiling Point Rise
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Difference in boiling points between solution and pure solvent.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Overall Heat Transfer Coefficient Reciprocal
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Combined resistance in heat transfer for evaporation.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Total Material Balance
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Mass balance for single effect evaporator.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Solid Balance

variables.x_F: Mass fraction of solids in feed
variables.x_L: Mass fraction of solids in concentrate

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Balance of solids in evaporation process.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Energy Balance for Evaporator
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.formula: F H_F + S H_S = L H_L + V H_V + S H_{C S}
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Detailed energy balance for evaporator.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Simplified Steam Energy
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.formula: S \lambda_S = L H_L + V H_V - F H_F
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Energy provided by steam condensation balances the enthalpy changes of feed, concentrate, and vapor.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Feed Enthalpy
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Enthalpy of feed assuming reference temperature is 0°C.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Concentrate Enthalpy
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Enthalpy of concentrate assuming reference temperature is 0°C.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Concentration Ratio

variables.x_L: Fraction of solids in the concentrate
variables.x_F: Fraction of solids in the feed

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Ratio of solid fractions in concentrate and feed.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Total Vapor in Multiple Effects
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Sum of vapors from each effect in a multiple effect evaporator.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Available Temperature Drop
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.formula: \Delta T_{\text{available}} = \Delta T_1 + \Delta T_2 + \Delta T_3 - \text{BPR} = T_S - T_3 - \text{BPR}
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Total temperature drop across all stages, adjusted for boiler pressure reduction.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Heat Transfer Rate in Effect
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.formula: q = U_1 \Delta T_1 = U_2 \Delta T_2 = U_3 \Delta T_3

variables.U_i: Overall heat transfer coefficient in effect i

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Equal heat transfer in each effect assuming same area.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Temperature in Effect 1
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Boiling temperature in first effect.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Temperature in Effect 2

variables.\\text{BPR}_1: Boiling point rise in first effect

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Boiling temperature in second effect.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Temperature in Effect 3

variables.\\text{BPR}_2: Boiling point rise in second effect

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Boiling temperature in third effect.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Vapor Temperature to Effect 2

variables.T_{S2}: Temperature of vapor entering second effect

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Temperature of vapor entering second effect.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Vapor Temperature to Effect 3

variables.T_{S3}: Temperature of vapor entering third effect

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Temperature of vapor entering third effect.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Heat Transfer Rate in First Effect

variables.q_1: Heat transfer rate in first effect
variables.\\lambda_{S1}: Latent heat of steam in first effect

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Heat from steam in first effect.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Area in First Effect

variables.A_1: Surface area for heat transfer in first effect

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Required heat transfer area for first effect.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Duhring's Rule BPR
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Empirical formula for boiling point rise.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Solution Heat Capacity
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Heat capacity of liquid solutions.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Dalton's Law for Moist Air
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Total pressure is sum of partial pressures.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Relative Humidity
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Ratio of vapor pressure to saturation pressure.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Humidity Ratio
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Mass of water vapor per mass of dry air.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Sensible Heat Transfer
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.formula: Q_s = m_a (h_w - h_2) = m_a c_{pm} (T_1 - T_2)
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Heat removed without moisture change.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Latent Heat Transfer
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Heat removed due to condensation.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Sensible Heat Factor
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Fraction of total heat that is sensible.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Cooling Load
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Total cooling required for air dehumidification.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Sensible and Latent Heat in Cooling
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Breakdown of cooling load.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Sensible Heat Transfer
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.formula: Q_s = m_a (h_w - h_2) = m_a c_{pm} (T_1 - T_2)

variables.h_w: Enthalpy of air after sensible cooling (J/kg)

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Heat removed from air without changing its moisture content.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Latent Heat Transfer

variables.h_w: Enthalpy of air after sensible cooling (J/kg)
variables.\\lambda_c: Latent heat of condensation at coil temperature (J/kg)
variables.H_1: Initial absolute humidity of air (kg water/kg dry air)
variables.H_2: Final absolute humidity of air (kg water/kg dry air)

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Heat removed due to condensation or moisture removal.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Sensible Heat Factor
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Fraction of total heat that is sensible (non-condensational).

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Bypass Factor
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.formula: \text{BPF} = \frac{T_2 - T_s}{T_1 - T_s} = \frac{H_2 - H_s}{H_1 - H_s} = \frac{h_2 - h_s}{h_1 - h_s}
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Measure of coil efficiency.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Water Added in Humidification

variables.H_i: Initial absolute humidity (kg water/kg dry air)
variables.H_f: Final absolute humidity (kg water/kg dry air)

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Calculates the mass of water added to air to reach desired humidity.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Enthalpy Change in Humidification
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Energy required to humidify air accounting for air and added water.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Water Balance in Mixing

variables.H_1: Humidity of air stream 1 (kg water/kg dry air)
variables.H_2: Humidity of air stream 2 (kg water/kg dry air)
variables.H_3: Humidity of mixed air (kg water/kg dry air)

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Conservation of water during mixing of two humid air streams.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Energy Balance in Mixing
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Conservation of energy during mixing of two air streams.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Mass Flow Rate from Volume
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Calculate mass flow of air from its volumetric flow and specific volume.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Heat Balance in Dryer
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.formula: M h_1 + G h_{G2} = M h_2 + G h_{G1}
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Energy balance for a dryer assuming no losses.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Solid Enthalpy
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.formula: h = C_{pd} T + C_{pw} X T

variables.C_{pw}: Specific heat of water in solid (J/kg·K)

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Calculate the enthalpy of a wet solid based on its moisture content.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Gas Enthalpy
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Enthalpy of humid air considering sensible and latent heat.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Moisture Balance in Dryer
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.formula: M X_1 + G H_2 = M X_2 + G H_1
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Balance of moisture between solids and drying air.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Moisture Content Wet Basis
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Moisture content expressed relative to total wet mass.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Moisture Content Dry Basis
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Moisture content expressed relative to dry mass.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Relation Between MC wb and db
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Converts moisture content between dry basis and wet basis.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Free Moisture Content
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Excess moisture above equilibrium.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Drying Rate
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Rate of moisture removal.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Drying Time in Constant Rate Period

variables.X_1: Initial moisture content (kg water/kg dry solid)
variables.X_2: Final moisture content (kg water/kg dry solid)

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Calculates the time required to dry a material during the constant rate period.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Flux of Water Vapor

variables.y_w: Mole fraction of water vapor at the surface
variables.y: Mole fraction of water vapor in the bulk air

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Describes the rate at which water vapor diffuses from the wet surface into the surrounding air.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Heat for Vaporization
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.formula: q = h A (T - T_w) = M_A N_A \lambda_w A
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Heat balance for the evaporation process, considering convection and latent heat.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Psychrometric Ratio
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Dimensionless ratio used in drying calculations linking heat and mass transfer.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Convective Heat Transfer Parallel Flow
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: For air parallel to surface.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Convective Heat Transfer Perpendicular Flow
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Convective heat transfer coefficient for air perpendicular to the surface.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Gas Mass Velocity
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Mass flow of gas per unit area.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Molar Specific Volume
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Approximate molar specific volume of moist air.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Density of Moist Air
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Calculation of moist air density.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Radiative Heat Transfer
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Heat transfer from a hot surface by radiation.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Radiation Heat Coefficient
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Effective radiation heat transfer coefficient.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Conductive Heat Transfer

variables.T: Temperature of hot fluid or tray (K)

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Heat transferred by conduction through a tray and solids.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Overall Conductivity Reciprocal
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Combined conductive resistances.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Drying Rate with Multiple Transfers
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.formula: R_C = \frac{(h_c + U)(T - T_s) + h_R (T_R - T_s)}{\lambda_s} = k_y M_B (H_s - H)
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Drying rate considering convection, conduction, and radiation effects.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Drying Time Linear Rate
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Drying time for linear falling rate period.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Drying Time Linear Through Origin

variables.X_c: Critical moisture content where linear rate starts

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Drying time assuming linear rate through origin.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Diffusion Equation
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Describes liquid diffusion in solids during drying.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Average Moisture in Diffusion
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Approximate solution for diffusion-controlled drying.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Drying Time Diffusion
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Time required for diffusion-controlled drying.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Drying Rate Diffusion
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Rate during diffusion period of drying.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Capillary Drying Time
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Drying time when capillary flow controls the process.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Moisture Balance in Dryer
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.formula: M X_1 + G H_2 = M X_2 + G H_1
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Represents moisture balance in a continuous dryer.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Fourier's Law of Heat Conduction
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Rate of heat conduction in one dimension.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Newton's Law of Cooling
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Convective heat transfer rate.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Log Mean Temperature Difference
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: For heat exchangers in countercurrent or cocurrent flow.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Fick's First Law of Diffusion
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Rate of diffusion in one dimension.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Mass Transfer Coefficient
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Convective mass transfer rate.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Nusselt Number
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Dimensionless number representing the ratio of convective to conductive heat transfer.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Sherwood Number

variables.D_{AB}: Diffusivity of species A in B (m²/s)

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Dimensionless number representing the ratio of convective to diffusive mass transfer.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Reynolds Number
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Ratio of inertial to viscous forces.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Prandtl Number
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Ratio of momentum to thermal diffusivity.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Schmidt Number

variables.D_{AB}: Mass diffusivity of species A in B (m²/s)

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Dimensionless number representing the ratio of momentum diffusivity (viscosity) to mass diffusivity.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Lewis Number

variables.D_{AB}: Mass diffusivity of species A in B (m²/s)

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Dimensionless number comparing thermal diffusivity to mass diffusivity.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Hagen-Poiseuille Law
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Calculates pressure drop for laminar flow of a Newtonian fluid through a circular pipe.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Fanning Friction Factor Laminar
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: For laminar flow in pipes.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Blasius Equation
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Used to estimate the friction factor for turbulent flow in smooth pipes.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Dittus-Boelter Equation
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Empirical correlation for convective heat transfer in turbulent pipe flow (typically for heating).

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Chilton-Colburn Analogy
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Analogy between heat and mass transfer.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Colburn j-Factor for Heat
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Dimensionless group used to correlate convective heat transfer in fluid flows.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Colburn j-Factor for Mass
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Dimensionless group used to correlate convective mass transfer in fluid flows.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Stefan Law for Diffusion
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Diffusion through stagnant gas.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Effectiveness-NTU Method
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: For counterflow heat exchanger.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Number of Transfer Units
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Dimensionless parameter for heat exchangers.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Fenske Equation for Minimum Plates
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: For distillation at total reflux.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Underwood Equation for Minimum Reflux
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: For multicomponent distillation.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Gilliland Correlation
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Relates reflux and stages in distillation.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: HTU for Absorption
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Height of transfer unit for gas phase.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: NTU for Absorption
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Number of transfer units for gas phase.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Packed Column Height
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Represents the total height of a packed column as the product of height of a transfer unit and the number of transfer units.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Murphree Efficiency for Tray
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Efficiency of a tray in distillation.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Weber Number
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Dimensionless number representing the ratio of inertial forces to surface tension forces.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Grashof Number
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Dimensionless number for natural convection, representing the ratio of buoyancy to viscous forces.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Peclet Number for Heat
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Ratio of advective to diffusive heat transport.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Peclet Number for Mass
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Ratio of advective to diffusive mass transport.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Graetz Number
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.formula: Gz = \frac{\pi D v \rho C_p}{4 L k}
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Dimensionless number for heat transfer in laminar pipe flow.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Biot Number for Heat
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Ratio of internal to external thermal resistance.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Biot Number for Mass
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Ratio of internal to external mass transfer resistance.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Fourier Number for Heat
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Dimensionless time for heat conduction.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Fourier Number for Mass
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Dimensionless time for mass diffusion.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Thiele Modulus
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Dimensionless number for diffusion and reaction in catalyst.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Effectiveness Factor
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Ratio of actual reaction rate to rate if entire particle were at surface concentration (first-order reaction in flat plate catalyst).

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Henry's Law
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Equilibrium for gas-liquid.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Raoult's Law
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: For ideal solutions.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: K-Value in Distillation

variables.y: Mole fraction of the component in the vapor phase
variables.x: Mole fraction of the component in the liquid phase

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: The K-value (equilibrium constant) relates the composition of a component in the vapor phase to that in the liquid phase during distillation.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Relative Volatility
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Relative volatility is the ratio of K-values for two components and indicates how easily one component can be separated from another by distillation.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: McCabe-Thiele Method Operating Line
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Rectifying section operating line.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Stripping Section Operating Line
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: For distillation column.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: q-Line for Feed
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Feed line in McCabe-Thiele.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Tray Efficiency Overall

variables.\\lambda: Stripping factor, defined as m V / L

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Overall tray efficiency relates the actual separation achieved to the Murphree efficiency and accounts for the stripping factor.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Flooding Velocity
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: For packed columns.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: HETP for Packed Column
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Height Equivalent to a Theoretical Plate (HETP) represents the height of packing required to achieve the same separation as one theoretical stage.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Liquid Holdup in Extraction
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Fractional holdup in liquid-liquid extraction.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Knudsen Diffusion Coefficient
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Diffusion in small pores.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Effective Diffusivity in Catalyst
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Effective diffusion in porous solid.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Weisz-Prater Criterion

variables.\\phi: Thiele modulus, characterizing diffusion vs reaction rate

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: Used to check for internal diffusion limitations in porous catalysts. A value of C_{WP} << 1 indicates negligible internal diffusion resistance.

Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.name: Mears Criterion
Simultaneous Heat and Mass Transfer.description: For external mass transfer limitation.
